content:
Your task is to Perform the following actions on the text provided in the following prompts:

1- Detect the Language of the Text
2- Translate the text into English if its in German OR into German if its in English
3- Return an Appropriate response in the input language
3- For each Word in the text, return the original word along with its literal translation into English/German in a JSON object

Use the following format:

{"language": <language of the input text>, "translation": <text translation>, "possible_response": <a plausible response to the text>, "word_json": <JSON with each word and its literal translation>}

Are you ready?
Yes, I am ready. Please provide text to work on.
